data.message: I'm so disappointed with you coca- Cola can I ask why your not going to Swindon this year. My 9 year child will think Christmas is not going to happen this year because she won't get to see the Coca-Cola lorry.

replies.message: We're sorry you're disappointed Victoria, it's not possible for us to visit each location, every year, so we try to add new destinations to give everyone the opportunity to come to see the truck on the build up to Christmas
The ad will still be on TV 😂
I never saw it before last year was the first time they came to Doncaster (As far as I know) and they’re coming again this year woo
You came to Looe a few years ago and it was very exciting and fun. Thanks. Hopefully you will be back one day
Don’t worry the coca-cola truck isn’t visiting Preston they haven’t came since 2014
Perhaps it's time to teach your child the true meaning of Christmas 🙄
Get a grip, if cola is her only association with Christmas. You're doing it wrong.  Lol
Coca-Cola is used as toilet cleaner in India. Nothing but suggery poison and it should be banned.
You're doing Christmas wrong.
Oh come on over reacting or what .. please get a grip
Yup, definitely Coca Cola's target market 😂😂

Coca-Cola  Very very poor u we’re in Oldham last year and was very rude to us when we had waited for ages with some patients to see the Christmas trucks we were spoken to dreadful by your staff and written a complaint to your head office we traveled with 8 older people with dementia ages between 65 and 81 some could not get near truck as we’re in wheel chair so we came over and asked for a bottle for all the paitents who could not make it over waited in minibus(2 in total )
I was in full uniform and had my id badge on 
I was told No very bluntly and was very disappointed with such a big world wide company when we write to complain givein the names of the cola staff and pictures which they tried to stop me taking
Coca Cola did not even send a response letter just a voucher for ONE small bottle of coke
Cannot explain how disgusted I was and still am to this day I will never buy a single product of yours again if you want to discuss details pm me and I will forward you the full emails I sent 
3 in total over a period of 13 days without a single reply
Because other cities exist too??
That could save you a fortune!

You could always see it in Bristol Cribbs Causeway 👍👍 though it’s just after Bonfire 🔥 night 
18 Nov !! So not much like Christmas really
I think your 9 yo will be disappointed if she does see it!  It is nothing like the advert - just a red lorry- no lights or magic!
Maybe take her to a nativity rather than to see a truck?
Not Winchester, or Portsmouth :(

To most people it might be just Lorry. Some people don't like to celebrate Christmas but they still celebrate it. We all have are things we like and believe in. Why is so wrong that my 9 year daughter still believes in Santa and that her dream to see the Coca-Cola Lorry. I do understands everyone like to see it and it can't go everywhere and thank you Coca- Cola for your response. Hopefully next year she will get her dream to see that one special Christmas Red Lorry. xx
Are you for real?
It's not the real one from tv anyway
Advertising a cancer causing drink to children. No thanks! 🚫🚫🚫🚫
Nobody wants to go to Swindon
Ben Delabane don’t bloody drink it then
Eeeeeeeek!!!!!!
